com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.util.context

Class LightWeightContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.util.context.Context
      • com.xceptance.xlt.nocoding.util.context.LightWeightContext

  • public class LightWeightContext
extends Context
    The Context used in the LightWeight mode of the execution.
    Author:
    ckeiner

      • loadWebResponse

        public void loadWebResponse(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequest webRequest)
                     throws com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.FailingHttpStatusCodeException,
                            java.io.IOException
        Loads the WebResponse corresponding to the WebRequest.
        If WebRequest.isXHR() is false, it loads the WebResponse via XltWebClient.getLightWeightPage(WebRequest).
        If WebRequest.isXHR() is true, it loads the WebResponse via XltWebClient.loadWebResponse(WebRequest).
        Specified by:
        loadWebResponse in class Context
        Parameters:
        webResponse -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.FailingHttpStatusCodeException

      • appendToResultBrowser

        public void appendToResultBrowser()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Appends the getLightWeightPage() to the result browser, if getLightWeightPage() is not null.
        Else creates a new LightWeightPage.
